EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Business Aviation Newsletter - NOV - DEC 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com]]> NEWS | Business Aviation Newsletter WI-FI THAT FLIES WHEREVER YOU FLY Honeywell networks the skies, enabling high bandwidth, consistent Wi-Fi and the best airborne connectivity experience for aircraft around the globe...
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/wifithatflies]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2016/october/honeywell-phases-in-laseref-iv-upgrade]]>
HONEYWELL PHASES IN LASEREF IV UPGRADE Operators of several major business jet types will soon have an excellent opportunity to replace outdated Laseref® II / III navigation systems with the Laseref IV all-digital ring laser gyro based inertial reference system...
FLIGHTSTAR DELIVERS ALL-IN-ONE UPGRADE FOR ADS-B, SERVICE AND MORE FOR LEARJET OPERATORS Mandate Compliance If you’re planning to take your Learjet 40 or 45 out for a spin on New Year’s Eve 2019, make sure you’re ADS-B Out-compliant...
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2016/october/flightstar-delivers-all-in-one-upgrade-for-ads-b-engine-and-service-for-learjet-operators]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2016/november/lcd-upgrade-gives-new-life-to-learjet-cockpits]]>
LCD UPGRADE GIVES NEW LIFE TO LEARJET COCKPITS DU-875 Displays Operators can breathe new life into their Learjet 40-series cockpits with Honeywell’s proven DU-875 flat panels...
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2016/october/honeywell-synthetic-vision-systems-now-available-for-gulfstream-giv-and-gv-operators]]>
SYNTHETIC VISION NOW AVAILABLE FOR GULFSTREAM GIV AND GV PlaneDeck SV Honeywell is offering the latest cockpit safety technologies to Gulfstream operators to modernize their aircraft and enhance safety...
